name: Tenant's remedy for failure by landlord to disclose
text: [§521-67]  Tenant's remedy for failure by landlord to disclose.  If the landlord fails to comply with any disclosure requirement specified in section 521-43 within ten days after proper demand therefor by the tenant, the landlord shall be liable to the tenant for $100 plus reasonable attorney's fees. [L 1972, c 132, pt of §1]
